children.name: Unique issuer information
children.description: Look for TLS issuer that is self-signed sharing the same issuer information.

children.name: public key size
children.description: Another key component that can be used for pivot is the public key size

children.name: Security header
children.description: List of security instruction. The important header is 'Content-security-policy' that is used to identifies what domain are allowed to serve content on the site, the goal is identify site with an security header that allow content from the domain in question.

children.name: favicon search
children.description: Looking at sites that the share the same favicon can lead to identifying the host IP of the site.
